font.face: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif

tr.td: You are here: Home | ERP Products | IMPulse (RMS)
Print bills and performs all front desk tasks within about 15 minute of training.

span.span: User-friendly touch screen POS allows staff of any experience to successfully process orders.

p.span: Customized and tailored to your business, RMS (Restaurant Management System) will maximize your business potential with our easy to use front of house or administration solutions.

RMS is fully integrated across different divisions of restaurant/café/bar like Stores, Recipes, Menu, Cash Counters, Accounts and Employees. RMS can handle complex customer ordering for example; pizza orders with half orders, plusses and minuses, combos, meal deals, upgrade to double or triple ingredients. RMS allows you to predetermine and price according to your business standards. No more questions asked by confused staff!
No matter whether your restaurant is part of a chain, a franchise or an independent eatery, Business Centre helps you stay in touch with the financial details of your business.

td.span: No matter whether your restaurant is part of a chain, a franchise or an independent eatery, Business Centre helps you stay in touch with the financial details of your business.

p.span: Multi-site management is easy with Business Centre, it sends data as it happens at outlet level to head office for instant review.
Manage menu; create combos/ meal deals for any special promotions that you choose to run.
Make instant changes or updates across all outlets or selected outlets.
View sales trends, Reconcile your daily takings.
Track staff time and attendance. Determine staff performance and top sellers.

td.p: Specifically target your customers via direct marketing with emails, mail outs and SMS .
Handles vendor ordering, recipes, food usage, cost reporting and more. Helps find and fix food cost and profitability problems like theft, poor portion control, spoilage, waste and under pricing.

p.span: Handles vendor ordering, recipes, food usage, cost reporting and more. Helps find and fix food cost and profitability problems like theft, poor portion control, spoilage, waste and under pricing.
You can manage raw materials, master raw materials, semi-finished ingredients and finished ingredients.
Stock is directly linked with Recipe, as soon as you sale any menu item it automatically decrease the stock.

div.span: Your stock levels are managed, automatically suggesting inventory items and quantities to order. Get alerts on critically low stock.

p.span: Use a touch screen to take customer orders! Design the order entry screens to fit the way your restaurant works. Training new employees is fast and easy.
Use a touch screen to take customer orders! Design the order entry screens to fit the way your restaurant works. Training new employees is fast and easy.

td.p: Order to tables, record position numbers, and print in separate courses if required .
Take restaurant reservations ; take drive-thru orders and rapid recall at the collection point.
Add extra ingredients and automatically increase the price accordingly .

p.span: You can create barcode based discount cards with parameters like maximum percentage allowed, maximum number of visits and maximum amount allowed.
A comprehensive accounts system is integrated with it, which controls the banks, purchases, advances and daily petty expenses.

div.span: A comprehensive accounts system is integrated with it, which controls the banks, purchases, advances and daily petty expenses.

td.p: HR/Payroll module enables you to manage salaries of you staff through attendance machine (Thumb/Card) and accounts module is directly linked with it for deduction of their advances. It will reduce the un-effective time of you staff for salary making.

div.span: HR/Payroll module enables you to manage salaries of you staff through attendance machine (Thumb/Card) and accounts module is directly linked with it for deduction of their advances. It will reduce the un-effective time of you staff for salary making.

td.p: Dashboard for daily sales, cost of materials, stock levels and cash position.
Dashboard for daily sales, cost of materials, stock levels and cash positio n.

p.span: You can print “Monthly Performance Report” of all you menu items by each month to check their popularity and profitability. You can compare it with others.
An “Aging report for Payable” is very helpful to mark due payments to maintain your Cash Flow.

td.p: Software is supported by fully integrated Security module which enables you to restrict Users according to their job description.

p.span: Software is supported by fully integrated Security module which enables you to restrict users according to their job description.

td.p: AWM and Alberta Sports signed contract for implementation of software.
AWM signed contract for implementing it application for manufacturing industry at Richa Leather.
AWM Systems signed a contract for implementation of "IMPulse - ERP for Instrument Manufacturing" with Technimen Agha (Pvt) Ltd.

p.span: AWM Systems signed an agreement for implementation of its ERP "IMPulse - Integrated Manufacturing for Instruments" at Towne Brothers (Pvt) Ltd.

td.div: We were in need of a quick solution for production of Soccer and Gloves, we had tried one but it ended up in failure. Then AWM contacted us and we started with Stock Management and I was surprised with their speed. Then we decided to move for full MIS integration.

Our compliance system is focal point for customer and we don't have room for mistakes while working with brands like Nike. AWM knows what we need and our customers as well and they achieve what we expect.
After a critical analysis based on technical skills, implementation methodology, industry knowledge and level of understanding; we select AWM Systems as our software development partner.

div.span: We have 4 stores and a warehouse and we are expanding but we were facing difficulties to streamline our inventory, distribution and sales operations and we have options to buy an off-the-shelf product but we hire AWM Systems to customize our business software as per our requirement and we are making it simple and straight.
